entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:10 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 32. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
